title: League Ranked in a nutshell
body:
EDIT: this is a rant, if you don't want to read it, go back to boards and avoid this post.


ADC: adc
Top: top/mid/adc
JasonWazza: mid pref
Last Pick: cant sup
JasonWazza: how can you not sup if one of your most played last season is thresh?
ADC: lel ikr
Last Pick: ?
Last Pick: oh
Last Pick: i said cant sup
Last Pick: LOL
Last Pick: soz typo op
JasonWazza: how is that a typo?
Jungle: fuck this   (Note this is said like 20 seconds after the above when shaco is picked)
Jungle: afk
Last Pick: why

I love how people think they can actually get away with saying something like "can't sup" or think that just because X champ is on the enemy team the game is over.

Oh and of course who can forget actually playing the game, our top laner is a riven main, and of course is a toxic little shit bag, who was premade with our jungler, who was also a toxic little shit bag.

Remember folks, if your toxic to someone, they will start to give less shits about the game and more then likely not help you win.

http://img02.deviantart.net/8020/i/2010/323/9/3/the_more_you_know_by_stathisnhx-d33639v.png

replies.body:
uhh.. He clearly meant that he can support.

Relax fellow.
Perhaps by typo he meant he "can" supp, instead of can't? Dunno.

Yes that's why he avoided explaining how it's a typo instead of just saying this.

No he was talking horse shit, was called out on it, and then avoided the question.
Maybe he just wants the best for the team and actually can't play support? Maybe he wants to win? Who knows.

>JasonWazza: how can you not sup if one of your most played last season is thresh?

This is relevant, basically i use the OP.GG multi search and anyone that says anything like they CAN'T sup i will check if they have a support, he did last season of thresh, with over 100 games and a 50% win rate.

There is no way in hell he "can't sup" because he fucking well could last season.
